params.loraHashes: Array of LoRA hashes to merge
params.mergeType: Type of merge (0: Linear, 1: SVD, 2: Task-Arithmetic)
params.weights: Weights for each LoRA (must sum to 1e18)

completeTraining(bytes32,string).notice: Complete LoRA training (called by operator after training)

inferWithLoRA(bytes32,bytes32,bytes).notice: Apply LoRA to base model for inference
